title: Multivariate-Normal probability density function — mvnpdf
code: mvnpdf(x, mean = rep(0, nrow(x)), varcovM = diag(nrow(x)), Log = TRUE)

title: Multivariate-Normal probability density function — mvnpdf
text: x p x n data matrix n number observations p number dimensions mean mean vector list mean vectors (either vector matrix) varcovM variance-covariance matrix list variance-covariance matrices (either matrix list) Log logical flag returning log probability density function. Default TRUE.

title: Multivariate-Normal probability density function — mvnpdf
text: list containing input matrix x y multivariate-Normal probability density function computed x
